name: Looper's Arena
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare #47 game jam (but I spent a day resting, so no compo).

Looper's Arena is a top-down fighting style game, using light mechanics combined with time dilation, essentially granting you more vision, at the expense of light lagging behind you.

The game features multiple upgrades, two spells to use, and high score tracking (no leader boards). Oh, and an endless mode which is the only mode.
